title._content: [St. Peter's Place, the obelisk, Rome, Italy] (LOC)

description._content: [St. Peter's Place, the obelisk, Rome, Italy] [between ca. 1890 and ca. 1900]. 1 photomechanical print : photochrom, color. Notes: Title from the Detroit Publishing Co., Catalogue J--foreign section, Detroit, Mich. : Detroit Publishing Company, 1905. Print no. "1179". Forms part of: Views of architecture and other sites in Italy in the Photochrom print collection. Subjects: Italy--Rome. Format: Photochrom prints--Color--1890-1900. Rights Info: No known restrictions on reproduction. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Views of architecture and other sites in Italy (DLC) 2001700650 More information about the Photochrom Print Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.pgz Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsc.06589 Call Number: LOT 13434, no. 161 [item]
